thread.title: InventHelp Invention Makes Fishing Trips Easier (JSN-107)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Invention Makes Fishing Trips Easier (JSN-107) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Invention Makes Fishing Trips Easier (JSN-107)
text:
InventHelp, founded in 1984, is submitting the FISHERMAN COOLER to applicable companies for their review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 14, 2015
It can be a hassle to take food, beverages, rods and other supplies along on a fishing trip, not to mention not having a simple way to store caught fish. In order to make fishing trips more convenient, an inventor from Jacksonville, Fla., conceived of a solution to this common problem.
The patent-pending FISHERMAN COOLER enhances convenience for fishing trips. It provides an easy way to store food, beverages and caught fish. It also facilitates the transport of rods and other items. Versatile and ergonomic, it also can be used at a beach or picnic.
The original design was submitted to the Jacksonville office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-JSN-107, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
